activity: Walk to Mercado de Ruzafa and buy one piece of fruit (no phone).
done_condition: when you're back home with the fruit

activity: Sit in Plaza del Doctor Landete and notice 5 new things.
Walk Calle Literato Azorín and find 3 pieces of street art you've never noticed.
Walk to Bluebell Coffee Co (C/ Buenos Aires 3), order a coffee to go, and take the first 3 sips outside slowly.
Walk to Blackbird (Carrer de la Reina Na Maria 7), stand outside, and do 10 slow shoulder rolls.
Pop into Dulce de Leche Boutique (Pintor Gisbert 2) and pick ONE pastry-then eat it mindfully outside.
Walk to Horno Valencia on Calle Cuba and buy a small loaf or roll.
done_condition: when you're back with the bread

activity: Walk down Calle Cuba and take 3 photos of interesting balconies/plant pots.
At Mercado de Ruzafa, pick one stall and name 5 colors you can see.
Walk to the nearest corner of Calle Sueca, then walk back counting 100 steps (no phone).
done_condition: when you hit 100 counted steps and arrive back

activity: Buy something small at Mercado de Ruzafa and practice a 1-sentence friendly interaction in Spanish.
done_condition: when you've completed the purchase and said thanks

activity: Walk to Plaza del Doctor Landete and do 3 rounds of physiological sighs on a bench.
Walk to Estación del Norte and find 3 tile details (animal, fruit, or flower).

Walk to Plaza del Ayuntamiento, sit for 2 minutes, then walk back.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: At Plaza del Ayuntamiento, notice 5 distinct sounds without naming their source.

Walk Calle Colón for 5 minutes, turn around immediately, return.
On Calle Colón, spot 3 different shoe styles and name them.
Buy one small thing in Valencia city and ask a simple question (e.g., '¿Tienes...?').
done_condition: when the question is asked and answered

activity: Add one debug log/print, run once, then remove it.
Reduce scope: pick the smallest version of the feature and write it down.
done_condition: when the smaller scope is written

activity: Send a 3-line status update to someone (what I did / next / blocker).
Ask for help with a precise question (include context + what you tried).
Schedule your next break on the calendar (10 minutes).
Reply to one email/message with the shortest honest answer.
Close one ticket/issue: comment 'done' + link to commit.
Walk to Mercado de Ruzafa and buy one small thing (fruit, nuts, or bread).
Walk to Mercado de Ruzafa, do one slow lap around the building, return.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Calle Cuba, pick a 'turnaround point' (a shop sign), then walk back.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Plaza del Doctor Landete and do 10 gentle calf raises at the edge of the plaza.
Walk to Calle Literato Azorín and take the long way back (one extra block).
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Bluebell Coffee Co and do a slow 'look-up' posture reset on the way (chin level).
done_condition: when you arrive back at your start point

activity: Walk to Blackbird, pause outside for 60 seconds, then walk back.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Horno Valencia on Calle Cuba and buy a single roll or pastry (optional).
done_condition: when you're back with it (or you decide not to buy)

activity: Sit in Plaza del Doctor Landete and do 4 rounds of box breathing (4-4-4-4).
At Mercado de Ruzafa entrance, do a 2-minute body-scan (jaw -> shoulders -> belly).
Walk to Calle Cuba and notice 10 different smells (bakery, soap, coffee...).
Stand near a tree in Ruzafa and take 12 slow breaths, counting them.
Walk to Calle Literato Azorín and take 3 photos of street art details (close-ups).
At Mercado de Ruzafa, pick one stall and describe it with 5 adjectives in notes.
Buy something small in Ruzafa and say one friendly sentence in Spanish (e.g., '¡Que vaya bien!').
Walk to Plaza del Doctor Landete, sit for 60 seconds, return.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Mercado de Ruzafa, touch the wall, and walk back (no phone).
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk one Ruzafa loop: go out one block, back a different block.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Sit in Plaza del Doctor Landete and do 10 slow breaths.
Walk to Calle Cuba and do a 'soft eyes' walk for 5 minutes (wide peripheral vision).
At Mercado de Ruzafa, pick a color and find 7 items that match it.
On Calle Literato Azorín, find one mural and sketch it as 5 simple shapes.
Say hello to one person (barista, neighbor, vendor) in Ruzafa-no extra chat needed.
Walk to Estación del Norte, touch one cool tile detail, and walk back.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Plaza del Ayuntamiento and do one slow lap around the square.
Walk to Mercado Central and buy one small thing (or just browse one aisle).
done_condition: when you finish the purchase or aisle

activity: Walk to Plaza de la Virgen, pause 60 seconds, then return.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk Calle de la Paz for 5 minutes, turn around, return.
Walk to Iglesia de San Agustín and sit for 2 minutes.
Walk Calle Colón and count 12 shop signs as you pass.
Walk to Estación del Norte and do 20 slow shoulder circles outside.
At Plaza del Ayuntamiento, do coherent breathing (5 in / 5 out) for 3 minutes.
At Plaza de la Virgen, notice 5 different sounds (no labeling).
Inside (or near) San Agustín, do 6 physiological sighs (double inhale, long exhale).
At Mercado Central entrance, pick one smell and take 8 slow breaths.
At Estación del Norte, find one tile pattern and sketch it as a simple grid.
done_condition: when the grid sketch is done

activity: On Calle de la Paz, pick one window display and write 3 adjectives about it.
Buy something small in Valencia city and ask one simple question in Spanish.
done_condition: when the question is asked and answered

activity: Walk to Estación del Norte, look up at the facade for 30 seconds, return.
done_condition: when you're back at your start point

activity: Walk to Plaza del Ayuntamiento and sit for 90 seconds.
Walk to Calle Colón, pick a turnaround point, and return.
At Plaza de la Virgen, do 10 slow breaths while watching the fountain.
At Plaza del Ayuntamiento, do a quick body-scan: jaw -> shoulders -> hands.
Walk Calle de la Paz with 'soft eyes' for 5 minutes (wide vision).
At Mercado Central entrance, take 2 photos of interesting typography/signage.
Smile and say 'buenos días' to one person in Valencia city.
